Author: SamuelR
Quote: Don’t correct those who misinterpret a better version of your ideas.

Author: SamuelR
Quote: Unsolved societal problems are inherited by future generations.

Author: SamuelR
Quote: Know your history before others teach you their interpretation of it.

Author: SamuelR
Quote: Everything complex is made out of simple parts working in unison.

Author: SamuelR
Quote: No thought is too old to receive new life.

Author: SamuelR
Quote: It's not over until you die.

Author: SamuelR
Quote: Know your leader as you share the consequences of their actions.
